input.sentences: it was a girl powered night at the concert . the first girl sang a really haunting song .
the next singer sang of heartbreak .
the one after that sang a really uptempo song while her friend played the guitar .
she then played a soft quiet ballad .
i got a program to remember the night by .
output.sentences: singer sang it so well it's heartbreaking
they played music nice and soft and quietly
it is a nice programe and lovly night to remember
